description: Simple Sensor Telemetry. A single data channel reading sent from a spaceheat node actor. The value is an integer.

ScadaReadTimeUnixMs.title: Scada Read Time in Unix Milliseconds

ChannelName.title: Data Channel Name
ChannelName.description: The name of the Channel getting reported

SpaceheatName.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by hypens, where first word starts with an alphabet character.

UTCMilliseconds.description: An integer reflecting unix time in MILLISECONDS between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC
